segments.text: I hear you are expecting your family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my parents , and soon my brother as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't know you had a brother .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , he is two years older than me . He lives in New Zealand so I don't see him that often .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , nice . Is he coming on his own or with the family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His son is coming as well . He wants to go to university here in England so they will visit a few universities while they are here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does your brother have just one son ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , he has two daughters as well . His wife and daughters are visiting her parents . So I won't see them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure your parents are looking forward to seeing their grandson .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes , they are really looking forward to it . They went to New Zealand last year and loved it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So when are they all coming ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My parents are already here . My brother and nephew are arriving on Monday .
segments.speaker: S2
